thought: The information regarding payment methods states "Barzahlung Keine Kreditkartenzahlung möglich" which translates to "Cash payment No credit card payment possible." This could be considered an unusual payment method for an e-commerce site, as credit card payments are common. However, this site appears to be primarily a physical location that focuses on gardening and landscaping services, as well as plant sales directly from their nursery and garden center. This type of business might reasonably operate on a cash-only basis, especially if they are dealing with local customers who visit in person. The website also mentions the possibility to book appointments and offers educational content such as a newsletter and gardening tips. This suggests a legitimate business operation rather than a typical online retailer. Given the combined observations from the website content, search results showing a legitimate business presence, and the lack of any strong indicators of fraud, I am inclined to conclude that the website does not exhibit the characteristics of a fraudulent site. The website https://www.pflanzen-weiglein.de/ does not appear to be a fraudulent site.
